title: Identifying the Root
text: How many times do we have to multiply a number by itself?
speech: How many times do we have to multiply a number by itself?
pacedSpeech: How many times do we have to multiply a number by itself?

title: Finding Factors
text: What are some factors that can be multiplied to get to 81?

title: Fourth Root
text: A number multiplied by itself $$4$$ times is to the fourth power.
speech: A number multiplied by itself  4  times is to the fourth power.
pacedSpeech: times is to the fourth power.
